snippet: The country is facing a dangerous moment with no guarantee that another transition will be any more successful than the last.
abstract: Editorial warns Egyptian military is threatening to impose control if protesters and Pres Mohammed Morsi's government do not soon arrive at resolution, calling it dangerous moment for country's burgeoning democracy; urges both parties to begin negotiations in order to avoid costly intervention that would set troubling precedent.
lead_paragraph: The country is facing a dangerous moment with no guarantee that another transition will be any more successful than the last.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
